results.title: The comparison of fennel infusion plus dry cupping versus metformin in management of oligomenorrhoea in patients with polycystic ovary syndrome: a randomised clinical trial.
results.text_hl: Some common clinical manifestations of this syndrome include @DISEASE_Dysmenorrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D004412 @@@menstrual disorders@@@ such as oligomenorrhoea and @<m>DISEASE_Calloso_genital_dysplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537962 @@@amenorrhoea@@@. The recommended therapeutic interventions include oral intervention, as well as @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, which are associated with an increased risk of @DISEASE_Thromboembolism @DISEASE_MESH:D013923 @@@vascular thromboembolism@@@, digestive complications such as @DISEASE_Nausea @DISEASE_MESH:D009325 @@@nausea@@@, and @DISEASE_Dizziness @DISEASE_MESH:D004244 @@@dizziness@@@, and @DISEASE_Vitamin_B_12_Deficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D014806 @@@vitamin B12 deficiency@@@.

citations.NLM: Mokaberinejad R, Rampisheh Z, Aliasl J, Akhtari E. The comparison of fennel infusion plus dry cupping versus metformin in management of oligomenorrhoea in patients with polycystic ovary syndrome: a randomised clinical trial. J Obstet Gynaecol. 2019 Jul;39(5):652-658. PMID: 30856025
